mutants.code:
import math

def calculate_minimum_time(n, m, town):
    min_row = n
    min_col = m
    max_row = max_col = 1
    cost = 0
    for (i, row) in enumerate(town):
        if '*' in row:
            min_row = min(i, min_row)
            max_row = max(i, max_row)
            min_col = min(min_col, row.find('*'))
            max_col = max(max_col, row.rfind('*'))
            cost = math.ceil(max(max_row - min_row, max_col - min_col) / 2) + 1
    return cost

            max_row = max(i, max_row)
            min_col = min(min_col, row.find('*'))
            max_col = max(max_col, row.rfind('*'))
            cost = math.ceil(max(max_row - min_row, max_col - min_col) / 2) + 1
    return cost

import math

def calculate_minimum_time(n, m, town):
    min_row = n
    min_col = m
    max_row = max_col = 0
    cost = 0
    for (i, row) in enumerate(town):
        if '*' in row:
            min_row = min(i, min_row)
            max_row = max(i, max_row)
            min_col = min(min_col, row.find('*'))
            max_col = max(max_col, row.rfind('*'))
            cost = math.ceil(max(max_row - min_row, max_col * min_col) / 2) + 1
    return cost
